title: What is the interpretation of the dream of the living kissing the dead in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of kissing the dead in a dream. It is one of the visions that everyone wants to know the interpretation of because most of its connotations are true. Therefore, we will deal with everything related to seeing the dead in a dream, whether it is kissing his head, hand, or greeting him. So follow the following lines. Interpretation of the dream of kissing the dead in a dream. What is the interpretation of dreams? For a living person kissing a dead person in a dream? A living person kissing a dead person in a dream is evidence of earning a lot of money, especially if the dead person is well-known. Seeing dead people in a dream also indicates goodness that the dreamer will obtain after a long period of fatigue and struggle. Whoever sees himself in a dream kissing A dead person and hugging him, this is a sign of the dreamer’s long life and attaining goodness from where it does not count. Whoever sees in a dream that he is kissing the head and hands of his deceased father and mother indicates a good condition, just as a dead person who kisses a living person in his dream indicates that the dead person in the afterlife will be in a good condition. And blessed. The kiss of a living person to a dead person in a dream symbolizes certainty if the deceased was of first class relative to the dead. If the deceased whom we saw in the dream was a friend, husband, mother, or father, then the dream shows how much the dreamer longs for him. Whoever sees in his sleep that he is kissing the hand of a dead person Valid, the dream is confirmation for the dreamer that his future is good. What is the interpretation of the dream of the living kissing the dead in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? The scholar Ibn Sirin says: Kissing the dead during sleep is evidence of the dead person’s need for supplication and charity. Seeing the deceased in a dream generally indicates that he does not feel comfortable, Because before his death, he had a debt and wanted to pay it off. The appearance of the deceased in the dream of an unmarried person could be a sign that the dreamer is close to marriage, and a life partner will come as he always desires. If you see yourself kissing one of the dead, do not panic, because seeing the dead is according to the interpretations of the great interpreters. Evidence of the dreamer’s long life, as we mentioned. Kissing the hand and head of the dead is a sign of achieving goals and aspirations. Kissing the living among the dead with a strong embrace indicates the health and well-being that the dreamer enjoys. To get the correct interpretation, conduct a search on Google, the Egyptian dream interpretation site. Interpretation of a dream about living Kissing the dead in a dream about a single woman. Kissing the living among the dead in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates abundant goodness that the dreamer will receive. As for an unrelated girl who dreams of kissing the hand of the deceased, the dream is an indication of the high morals that the dreamer has, in addition to calmness. The great interpreters, including Al-Zahiri and Ibn Shirin, said that seeing people kissing and embracing the dead person means that the dead person is in dire need of supplication. Whoever sees that he is kissing a dead person, but does not know who he is, then the vision indicates that the dreamer will obtain great sustenance and benefit. Kissing the living among the dead in a dream is a sign. On the tenderness and tenderness of the heart. Interpretation of a dream about a living person kissing a dead person in a dream about a married woman. The dream of the living kissing the dead in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the abundant goodness that she will obtain. A married woman who sees in her dream the death of her son has no need to fear, because the vision promises goodness.

title: Interpretation of a dream about rain by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about rain is one of the visions that many people see in their dreams, and this vision carries many interpretations, one of which indicates good effects and the other negative meanings, which we will clarify through our article in the following lines, so that the dreamer's heart is reassured and does not get distracted by many different interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about rain Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream is a reassuring dream that carries many good meanings that indicate that the owner of the dream will be able to achieve all the desires and desires that he has sought for long periods. If a person sees rain in his dream, this is a sign that God will open many doors of goodness and great living before him, which will be a reason for his ability to improve his standard of living in the coming periods, God willing. The dreamer who sees rain falling while hearing the sound of thunder in his dream, this indicates that he will go through an experience or a problem that will take him some time to get rid of in the coming period. When a person sees himself standing in front of the window to watch the rain falling while he is asleep, this is evidence that he lives a life in a state of comfort and reassurance that makes him able to focus well on his life, whether personal. Practice. Seeing rain in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be able to get rid of all the major problems and crises that occurred in his life in previous periods and were a cause of discomfort and instability in his life. Interpretation of a dream about rain by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing rain in a dream indicates that the dreamer enjoys comfort and reassurance in his life after going through a period full of problems and bad and sad events. If the dreamer sees rain falling in his dream, this is a sign that he will be able to overcome all the obstacles and difficulties that stood in his way in previous periods and were the obstacle between him and his dreams. The man who sees rain falling in his dream, this indicates the approaching date of his marriage to a beautiful girl adorned with her faith and good morals that make him live with her a life full of joy and happiness. Seeing rain falling while the dreamer is asleep indicates that he will achieve many great successes, which will be a reason for him to obtain many major promotions in his work, which will be a reason for him to be respected and appreciated by all his managers. At work, which will also return to his life with a lot of money that will be the reason for raising his physical and social level. When a man sees rain in a dream, this is evidence that all the people around him trust him and everyone trusts him with all the secrets of their lives and resorts to him to help them solve all the problems they face in their lives. He has great wisdom and mind. Interpretation of a dream about rain for a single woman If a single woman sees rain in her dream, this is a sign that she will have many opportunities that she will benefit from to build a successful and bright future in which she will achieve many great goals and ambitions. Interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the radical changes that will occur in her life and the course of her life will change

title: Seeing a dead person at a wedding in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of seeing a dead person’s wedding in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the dead at a wedding in a dream A wedding is a ceremony in which lovers officially announce their engagement to start a new life. Everyone prepares for it and wants to attend for the blessing, but what if one of the dead attends? What is the interpretation of seeing the deceased at a wedding in a dream? What if he is the groom himself? Does the dream remain a symbol of joy and happiness, or does it turn into a disturbing and frightening omen? Seeing the dead at a wedding in a dream If the wedding was completely calm and the dead was sitting in his seat but happy and smiling, this is a sign of a lot of good and happy news in the coming days. If the groom is the deceased father, this vision has many interpretations, as it is evidence of the marriage of one of the sons soon, perhaps the owner of the dream or one of his sisters. It is also evidence of the righteousness of one of the sons because he does many charitable works that bring good reward to the deceased father and raise his status. But if the deceased sits at the wedding with a frowning face, this is an indication that the other party is cheating. As for wearing white at the wedding, this may indicate that he is a good person and a good position in the afterlife. Sometimes this vision is a warning message to the person about the presence of bad company around him and its appearance in the guise of kindness and affection, but it works to harm him. It can also indicate the goals and desires that the person wanted to achieve before marriage. As for the presence of the dead in a frightening way, with the intention of spoiling the wedding and harming those present, this indicates That there is someone who is chasing the bride and groom and wants to harm them. Also, his presence in the form of a miserable demon suggests that the dreamer carries in his heart many negative feelings such as fear, anxiety, and the inability to confront or fight the battles of life. It also indicates that the dreamer feels very lonely and wants to fill his life with friendships and acquaintances and to have a close friend to tell him his secrets. Seeing the dead at a wedding in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin suggests that this vision is a bad omen or the occurrence of some bad events in the coming period of the dreamer's life. He also says that marriage in general often does not bring good and is not a sign of happiness and joy as it actually is. But sometimes it is a good vision, if an invitation is sent to the deceased and his invitation comes in his hands, this is a sign of the end of a long period of sadness that the woman lived through due to the loss of a family member. .And also whoever sees that as soon as the deceased attends the wedding, a violent quarrel breaks out between those present, this indicates the bad reputation of one of the spouses and the reputation of that party with its corrupt morals among those around him. Seeing the dead at a wedding in a dream for a single woman The marriage of the deceased in a dream to an unmarried woman can have good omens or bad interpretations, depending on how close the deceased was to her and the marriage. If the deceased was the groom and was in a public place, but there was a lot of noise at the wedding, this indicates that a big problem will happen to her soon. It can also express that this girl has negative feelings towards the past, as she always remembers past events

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating fish for a divorced woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream in which a divorced woman eats fish in a dream. We will present in the following lines the interpretation of a dream in which a divorced woman eats fish in a dream according to what scholars have said and not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream in which a divorced woman eats fish in a dream. Interpretation of a dream in which a divorced woman eats fish in a dream can be a sign of kindness and God. I know the unseen. If a divorced woman is seen eating delicious fish, it may be a sign of a new beginning, and God knows the unseen. When a divorced woman sees fried fish in a dream, it could be a sign of getting rid of problems, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a divorced woman sees fried fish, this may indicate solving problems and returning. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating a gate for a divorced woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating a gate for a divorced woman in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this. title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a bridge or bridge in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a bridge or bridge in a dream: The dreamer may see that he is standing on a bridge in the dream or has succeeded in crossing it, and he may see that he has fallen from above and is in danger of the dream through the following. Interpretation of the dream of a bridge in a dream: Seeing a bridge in a dream contains seven signs: First: It A praiseworthy vision if the dreamer dreams that he is crossing a high bridge, because this symbol indicates many promising changes in his life, and this change can be represented in different forms, including the following: By moving from a simple job to an important professional position, the dreamer may look forward to establishing his company Especially to earn a lot of halal money. Perhaps this change that the person is going through is his transition from a simple residence to a residence more luxurious and luxurious than this. It is possible that this change is related to the emotional side of human life. If the dreamer is married and her married life is not calm in wakefulness Perhaps her dream of crossing a high bridge indicates that her relationship with her husband is free of the temptations and quarrels that filled her, and then she enjoys it. Thus. Second: If a divorced woman dreams that she is crossing a bridge, this is a sign of her success in overcoming her problems related to divorce, which are summed up in her obtaining all her legal and legal rights and that her ex-husband will not be harmed or harmed. That she will want to renew her energy and fill her heart with hope so that she can start a new life free of pain. Third: If the widow sees a bridge in her dream and crosses it safely and securely, this is a sign that she will be relieved of her pain and all her coming days will be joy and happiness and she can enter a new life. Through her marriage again. Fourth: One of the translators pointed out that crossing the bridge is a sign of the dreamer’s guidance and performing the rituals of his religion without getting bored. The prayer will be at its exact time and follow the Sunnah of our Master Mustafa and you will perform it soon. Fifth: Seeing the bridge can be interpreted that the dreamer will gain a lot of knowledge soon, and this also indicates academic success at all educational levels. Except: If the dreamer succeeds in crossing the bridge, this is a sign that he will survive. Of the torment that some people will face in the afterlife as a result of neglecting their religion, the symbol of the bridge indicates that the dreamer will live happily with God. It will give him a life free of problems and stress. Seven: If the dreamer sees in his dream that the bridge was built from solid stones and suddenly sees that it was built with the ground (meaning that the building materials with which it was built were made from stones in the ground), then this bad dream is interpreted. That the dreamer will change his circumstances from better to worse. If he was rich, he would suffer from drought and debt, and if he was happy in life, he would find misfortune to accompany him. But if the opposite happened and the dreamer saw in his dream that the bridge built with earth had become solid and built with stones, then this scene will be interpreted. Contrary to the bad symbols previously mentioned. It is known that dreams differ from wakefulness and that many things happen in them that we do not see in reality...human to inanimate objects and this symbol has many meanings in interpretation. Then if the dreamer sees that he turned around and became a bridge in the dream and everyone crossed it, This is p

It is known that dreams differ from wakefulness and that many things happen in them that we do not see in reality...human to inanimate objects and this symbol has many meanings in interpretation. title: What is the interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream?

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream through this article today. God Almighty said: (They said, “Dreams are foolish dreams.”) And we do not explain dreams in terms of two worlds (44), for he is wonderful in his life, and some of them are just dreams made by Satan, and some of them are true visions of God Almighty. Therefore, it is not necessary to get confused and pay attention to the interpretation of dreams. Only God Almighty knows the unseen, and in this article today in the encyclopedia we present the interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream in different situations. Follow us. Woman in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is considered the most important interpreter of dreams in the world, and in his interpretation of seeing a woman in a dream he sees the following: Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a woman in a dream is generally a praiseworthy vision that portends to the dreamer goodness, nourishment, joy, and pleasure, especially if this woman is beautiful. If a person sees in a dream a beautiful and elegant woman entering his house. This vision expresses the joy and pleasure that comes to him. If a person sees a group of girls in his dream, it symbolizes the dreamer’s behavior in all the problems and difficulties he faces in his life. But if a young woman sees in a dream a group of young girls. This indicates the presence of an enemy with hatred and envy. Seeing obese women in a dream means joy and happiness for the dreamer and pleasant events that will happen soon. If someone sees in a dream a group of unknown women. These visions are praiseworthy. Seeing a smiling woman in a dream represents the happiness and goodness that will come to the person who sees her, in terms of money, job opportunities and everything that is good for him. Seeing an old woman is good news for him. He sees all his circumstances. If a sick person sees an old woman With white hair. This vision expresses the recovery of this man from his illness. If a poor man sees an old woman with white hair in a dream; This vision indicates that the dreamer will bring abundant money and that he will be among the rich. But if the sinner sees an old woman with white hair? This vision shows that he will return to Almighty God and to the straight path. Seeing a young woman turning into an old woman symbolizes that this person’s situation will change for the better and that he will meet all his demands. Interpretation of a woman in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a woman in an unmarried girl’s dream generally expresses The dreamer's upcoming new life. If an unmarried girl sees a beautiful girl in her dream. This dream symbolizes the happiness that will come to her in the near future. Seeing a single girl with a beautiful young woman talking to her indicates that this girl is approaching superiority. If a single girl sees an ugly woman in a dream. This vision expresses the hostility and hatred that appears against this girl, but she will overcome it. Seeing a group of women in a single girl’s dream means that she will achieve great success in her work and in her community soon. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a group of women dancing. This symbolizes the approach of sad events. But if he sees a group of women wearing white clothes, is this true? This indicates the approach of her engagement. The unknown woman in a single woman’s dream, if t

preview.html: The color of dogs also differs in interpretation among different people. In fact, some people love dogs, others fear them. From this article we will explain to you the interpretations of this vision, so follow us on the website gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream for a single girl: Seeing a large dog and a pet dog and feeding it in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates the ability to overcome the barrier of fear in the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. If a girl sees in a dream that she is running away from a predatory dog, it indicates that there is a person in her life who is trying to get close to her, but she is trying to stay away from him because it hurts her a lot. But if an unmarried girl sees black dogs in her dream, the dream shows that he has bad friends, but he He does not know them and deceives them, but he will soon find out. Seeing a white dog in the dream of an unmarried girl. Good news for her indicates that she will marry a young man who loves her with sincere feelings. What if a girl sees a red dog in her dream? It says that he will fall into a crisis and go through a painful period. But if The dog that the unmarried woman saw in her dream is brown. It indicates that the dreamer is envious or bewitched by someone close to her, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Seeing a gray dog ​​in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she has a friend or relative who hates her and does not wish her well. If she sees A girl dreamed that a dog was chasing her and she wanted to catch her and bite her, but she moved away from him. It is a major misfortune that was going to happen to her but God saved her from it. But if the dog was able to bite her or hurt her, then this dream is a warning vision. The dream indicates that he is in danger in Reality. See also: Interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of tracking dogs in a dream for a married woman. Seeing dogs in a dream for a married woman. In reference to the presence of a group of people who are angry with her, and have gathered against her evil. It may be very close to the dreamer. Scholars and translators have agreed that A married woman sees dogs in a dream, especially if she feels fear and discomfort. This indicates that there is someone conspiring against her to drive a wedge between her and her husband, and God knows best. But if a married woman sees in her dream a small dog and she is happy to see it and play with it, the dream indicates that she will get to know him. Soon the news of her pregnancy, God willing. If a married woman sees that she is putting food and drink for small dogs in her house. The dream indicates a lot of goodness and abundance of livelihood that she will enjoy in the coming days. Seeing children playing with obedient and peaceful dogs in a married woman’s dream indicates achievement. Academic if they are studying. But if a married woman sees in a dream a group of pet dogs, but feels afraid of them. She expresses her fear in reality for her children without any reason for this fear. A dog bite in a married woman’s dream indicates the loss of someone or something dear to her. Interpretation of seeing dogs in a dream for a man and its meaning: Seeing big black dogs and dirty, ugly looks in a man’s dream. It states that the dreamer’s hidden enemies are waiting for him to make the slightest mistake. Seeing big, black dogs in front of the house can be a solution.

title: Interpretation of the number 45 in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of the number 45 in a dream for a single woman: Some dreams attract the dreamer’s attention, which makes him begin researching and investigating the interpretation of this dream, including research. Interpretation of the number 45 in a dream for a single woman, whether she is married or pregnant, the interpretation varies from one person to another. The interpretation of numbers in a dream generally varies from one person To another, it also varies according to the dreamer’s vision and according to the number that the dreamer saw, so even numbers differ from one person to another. Interpretation of seeing the number five in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Before we meet. Interpretation of the number 45 in a dream for a single, married, or pregnant woman. We will learn about the interpretation of each number separately through the site. The number is different. Five in the dream interpretation dictionary is the rule that expresses four balances in life, which are passion, work, health and money. The number five may refer to the five pillars of Islam in the dream, and it may be a reference to the duties of the five daily prayers, pointing out shortcomings or adhering to them. The number five It shows the dreamer the general balance in life and the extent of the dreamer’s happiness and sense of joy and satisfaction. The number five in a pregnant woman’s dream refers to the first five months of pregnancy or the remaining five weeks of pregnancy. As for the interpretation of the number five for a single woman, it indicates that the engagement period will continue for five years or five months. The number five in the dream of an engaged girl indicates the completion of her marriage after five days, five months, or five years. But if an unmarried girl dreams that she is writing the number five, this indicates a good vision and she will soon obtain a lot of money. In the case of the girl who dreams of seeing five pounds Paper, this indicates a close marriage to a wealthy person. Read also: Interpretation of dreams with hair advice for a single and married woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the number 4 in a dream for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the number 45 in a dream for a single woman. The number four is the second number. Interpretation of the number 45 in a dream for a single woman. After interpreting the number five In the first part, we move on to the interpretation of the number four in one dream. Ibn Sirin interprets the number four in general, as one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate goodness and happiness that the dreamer will obtain. If he sees an unmarried woman in his dream number four, this means that he will soon receive an offer. Marriage and that the husband will be good and suitable for marriage. In the case of a girl who counted the number four in a dream, this indicates that she will soon receive good and happy news, and this news will make her very happy. Seeing the number four in a single girl’s dream also means that she will get a wonderful job opportunity in The near future, and this opportunity may come during this week. And the number forty in a dream may It indicates the dreamer’s distance from God and the passage of a period full of feelings of distress, so God Almighty says: “He said: I forbade them for forty years, and they

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that you are eating candy in a dream. In the following lines we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about eating candy in a dream, where you can find out what it means, as reported by scholars and interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about eating candy in a dreamInterpretation of dreams about eating candy in a dream and seeing sweets can symbolize happiness God willing, wherever the dreamer sees himself eating sweets, this leads to happiness, God willing. If a married woman is seen eating sweets, this may indicate the satisfaction of desires, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream eating sweets, it could be a sign of goodness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream Eating a strange and delicious fruit in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating a strange and delicious fruit in a dream. We did not find any specific interpretations of seeing this. However, seeing fruits being eaten can lead to goodness, and God has all knowledge. If a married woman sees herself eating fruit in a dream, it may be a sign of constancy, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself eating fruit, This may represent the satisfaction of desires, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about rotten fruit in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about rotten fruit in a dream could be a sign of trouble, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees rotten fruit, this may mean that he will be exposed to problems, and God knows best. If a married woman sees rotten fruit in a dream, she may It is a sign that she will be exposed to loss, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees rotting fruit in a dream, this may express that she is exposed to loss, and God is Great and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of fruit falling from the sky in a dream could indicate goodness and livelihood, and God The highest and most knowledgeable: If the dreamer sees fruit falling from the sky, it may be good news, and God knows all that is not seen. If a married woman sees fruit falling from the sky in a dream, it may be a sign of goodness and sustenance, God willing. When a single girl sees fruit falling from the sky in a dream, it could be A sign of goodness and happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating fruit in a dream. If a married woman sees fruit, this indicates that she will get money, and God knows the unseen.
